AI_QUICK_TEMPER.NAME: Quick Temper
AI_QUICK_TEMPER.DESC: Whenever [ENEMY] shuffles their deck, Deploy [S] Irked.

AI_RIFLED_POCKETS.NAME: Rifled Pockets
AI_RIFLED_POCKETS.DESC: Unplayable. When drawn, copy [N] card(s) from [ENEMY]'s hand and add them to your hand, then Scour this.

AI_RITES.NAME: Rites
AI_RITES.DESC: Deal [D] damage. Deals bonus damage equal to the number of your Talisman arguments (currently [N]).

DECKARD_ADAPTIVE.NAME: Adaptive
DECKARD_ADAPTIVE.DESC: Whenever the Ambience phase changes, apply [S] Poise to all your arguments.

DECKARD_ADDENDUM.NAME: Addendum
DECKARD_ADDENDUM.DESC: When drawn, deal [D] damage to a random enemy argument and Deploy [S] Finesse.

DECKARD_ANGER.NAME: Anger
DECKARD_ANGER.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
If Ambience is Agitated, Volatile, or Dangerous: Deploy [STACKS] Heated.

DECKARD_AUTHORITATIVE.NAME: Authoritative
DECKARD_AUTHORITATIVE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Deals bonus damage equal to the combined stack count of all your support arguments.

DECKARD_BARRAGE.NAME: Barrage
DECKARD_BARRAGE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage X times.
Influential X.
DECKARD_BARRAGE.DESC+:
Deal [D] damage X+1 times.
Influential X+1.

DECKARD_BARREL_THROUGH.NAME: Barrel Through
DECKARD_BARREL_THROUGH.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Deals bonus damage equal to half your Poise.

DECKARD_BREAKTHROUGH.NAME: Breakthrough
DECKARD_BREAKTHROUGH.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Whenever the Ambience phase changes towards Guarded, this card costs 0 until your next turn.

DECKARD_BRASH.NAME: Brash
DECKARD_BRASH.DESC: Deal [D] damage to all enemy arguments.

DECKARD_BULLDOZE.NAME: Bulldoze
DECKARD_BULLDOZE.DESC: Whenever an enemy argument is destroyed, draw [S] card(s) and gain [S] action(s).

DECKARD_CALM.NAME: Calm
DECKARD_CALM.DESC:
Apply [P] Poise to all your arguments.
Double your Poise.

DECKARD_CAPITALIZE.NAME: Capitalize
DECKARD_CAPITALIZE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
If an enemy argument was destroyed this turn, this costs 0 and deals double damage.

DECKARD_CHALLENGE.NAME: Challenge
DECKARD_CHALLENGE.DESC: Remove all Poise from your core argument to deal damage equal to Poise removed.

DECKARD_CURVEBALL.NAME: Curveball
DECKARD_CURVEBALL.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Deal Piercing damage if the last card played this turn was a Dialogue card.
Draw [N] cards if the last card played this turn was an Influence card.

DECKARD_COMEBACK.NAME: Comeback
DECKARD_COMEBACK.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

DECKARD_CROSS_EXAMINATION.NAME: Cross-Examination
DECKARD_CROSS_EXAMINATION.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Can only target enemy support arguments.

DECKARD_DECISIVE_ACTION.NAME: Decisive Action
DECKARD_DECISIVE_ACTION.DESC:
Remove all Poise from your arguments. Deploy 1 Inept.
Gain [ACTIONS] actions.

DECKARD_DEFUSAL.NAME: Defusal
DECKARD_DEFUSAL.DESC:
If the Ambience is Guarded or Tense, draw [N] cards.
Influential [S].

DECKARD_DEJA_VU.NAME: Déjà Vu
DECKARD_DEJA_VU.DESC:
Create [DUPES] copy of a support argument.
Scour.
DECKARD_DEJA_VU.DESC+:
Create [DUPES] copies of a support argument.
Scour.

DECKARD_DOMINEER.NAME: Domineer
DECKARD_DOMINEER.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
If this destroys an enemy argument, draw [DRAW] cards and gain [ACTIONS] actions.

DECKARD_ESCALATE.NAME: Escalate
DECKARD_ESCALATE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
If Ambience is Agitated, Volatile, or Dangerous: deals +[BONUS] damage.
If Ambience is Dangerous: damage is dealt to ALL enemy arguments.

DECKARD_FILIBUSTER.NAME: Filibuster
DECKARD_FILIBUSTER.DESC:
Apply [P] Poise to all your arguments.
Scour.

DECKARD_FLATTER.NAME: Flatter
DECKARD_FLATTER.DESC: Deal [D] damage. If you have Finesse, damage is dealt to ALL enemy arguments.

DECKARD_FOLLOW_UP.NAME: Follow Up
DECKARD_FOLLOW_UP.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Whenever the Ambience phase changes, return this card from your discard pile to your hand.

DECKARD_GOOD_IMPRESSION.NAME: Good Impression
DECKARD_GOOD_IMPRESSION.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Increase the cost of this card by 1 for the rest of negotiation.

DECKARD_GRANDIOSITY.NAME: Grandiosity
DECKARD_GRANDIOSITY.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
This card costs 1 less for each friendly support argument in play.

DECKARD_GUARDED_RESPONSE.NAME: Guarded Response
DECKARD_GUARDED_RESPONSE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Apply Poise to all your arguments equal to damage dealt by this card.

DECKARD_HOTHEADED.NAME: Hotheaded
DECKARD_HOTHEADED.DESC: Whenever the Ambience phase changes towards Dangerous, draw [S] cards.

DECKARD_IMPATIENCE.NAME: Impatience
DECKARD_IMPATIENCE.DESC:
Choose a friendly support argument.
Gain actions equal to its stack count, then destroy it.
Scour.

DECKARD_INSIGHT.NAME: Insight
DECKARD_INSIGHT.DESC+:
Draw [N] cards.
Apply [POISE] Poise to ALL your arguments.

DECKARD_INSTINCTS.NAME: Instincts
DECKARD_INSTINCTS.DESC: Choose: Deploy [STACKS] Finesse or [STACKS] Heated. Each choice has Influential [INFLUENCE].

DECKARD_INTERROGATE.NAME: Interrogate
DECKARD_INTERROGATE.DESC: Choose a friendly support argument. Deal damage equal to [MULTIPLIER] times its stack count to ALL enemy arguments, then destroy it. Influential [INFLUENCE].
DECKARD_INTERROGATE.DESC+:
Choose a friendly support argument.
Deal damage equal to [MULTIPLIER] times its stack count to ALL enemy arguments, then destroy it.
Set Ambience to Dangerous.

DECKARD_JABBER.NAME: Jabber
DECKARD_JABBER.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Apply [P] Poise to your core argument.

DECKARD_KNACK.NAME: Knack
DECKARD_KNACK.DESC:
Draw [N] cards.
Deploy Finesse equal to the number of Dialogue cards drawn.

DECKARD_MAGNETIC_PERSONALITY.NAME: Magnetic Personality
DECKARD_MAGNETIC_PERSONALITY.DESC: Whenever the Ambience phase changes, Deploy [S] Finesse and [S] Heated.

DECKARD_OBLIGATION.NAME: Obligation
DECKARD_OBLIGATION.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Add [S] stack(s) to ALL your support arguments.

DECKARD_OVERBEAR.NAME: Overbear
DECKARD_OVERBEAR.DESC: Deal [D] damage for each friendly argument.

DECKARD_PANACHE.NAME: Panache
DECKARD_PANACHE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Whenever the Ambience level changes, double this card's damage for the rest of the turn.

DECKARD_PIVOT.NAME: Pivot
DECKARD_PIVOT.DESC: Choose: Change Ambience one level towards Guarded or Dangerous.
DECKARD_PIVOT.DESC+: Choose: Change Ambience two levels towards Guarded or Dangerous.

DECKARD_PIVOT_AGGRESSION.NAME: Aggression
DECKARD_PIVOT_AGGRESSION.DESC: Change Ambience one level towards Dangerous.
DECKARD_PIVOT_AGGRESSION.DESC+: Change Ambience two levels towards Dangerous.

DECKARD_PIVOT_DIALOGUE.NAME: Dialogue
DECKARD_PIVOT_DIALOGUE.DESC: Change Ambience one level towards Guarded.
DECKARD_PIVOT_DIALOGUE.DESC+: Change Ambience two levels towards Guarded.

DECKARD_PRESENT_THE_EVIDENCE.NAME: Present the Evidence
DECKARD_PRESENT_THE_EVIDENCE.DESC:
Add [S] stack(s) to a friendly support argument.
Deal damage equal to its stack count to a random enemy argument.

DECKARD_RACK_THE_BRAIN.NAME: Rack the Brain
DECKARD_RACK_THE_BRAIN.DESC:
Choose 1 of [CHOICES] cards from your draw pile to add into your hand.
Reduce its cost to 0.
Scour.

DECKARD_RAPID_FIRE.NAME: Rapid Fire
DECKARD_RAPID_FIRE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage to a random enemy argument.
Deploy [S] Chatterbox.

DECKARD_REINFORCE.NAME: Reinforce
DECKARD_REINFORCE.DESC:
Double a friendly support argument's resolve.
Restore it to full resolve.
Scour.
DECKARD_REINFORCE.DESC+:
Triple a friendly support argument's stack count.
Restore it to full resolve.
Scour.

DECKARD_REVERSAL.NAME: Reversal
DECKARD_REVERSAL.DESC: Steal all Poise from an enemy argument and apply it to your core argument.
DECKARD_REVERSAL.DESC+: Steal all Poise from an enemy argument and apply it to ALL your arguments.

DECKARD_ROLL_WITH_IT.NAME: Roll With It
DECKARD_ROLL_WITH_IT.DESC:
Unplayable.
When this card is in your hand, transform this into a copy of the next card you play.
DECKARD_ROLL_WITH_IT.DESC+:
Unplayable.
When this card is in your hand, transform this into an upgraded copy of the next card you play.

DECKARD_RUMINATE.NAME: Ruminate
DECKARD_RUMINATE.DESC: Choose a card in hand. Give it Preserve.

DECKARD_SMOKE_BREAK.NAME: Smoke Break
DECKARD_SMOKE_BREAK.DESC:
Set the Ambience to Guarded.
Scour.

DECKARD_SNIPING_REMARK.NAME: Sniping Remark
DECKARD_SNIPING_REMARK.DESC:
Remove all Poise from target argument.
Deal [D] damage.

DECKARD_STAY_COOL.NAME: Stay Cool
DECKARD_STAY_COOL.DESC: At the start of your turn, apply [S] Poise to your core argument.

DECKARD_TANTRUM.NAME: Tantrum
DECKARD_TANTRUM.DESC: Deal [D] damage to a random enemy argument [ITERATIONS] times.

DECKARD_TRASH_TALK.NAME: Trash Talk
DECKARD_TRASH_TALK.DESC: Deal [D] damage to a random enemy argument [ITERATIONS] times.

DECKARD_TURNABOUT.NAME: Turnabout
DECKARD_TURNABOUT.DESC: Deal [D] damage. If Ambience is Guarded or Tense: this deals double damage and has Influential [INFLUENCE].

ESPHER_JUXTAPOSITION.NAME: Juxtaposition
ESPHER_JUXTAPOSITION.DESC: Refresh the use of your partner ability this negotiation. Scour.
QUIPS: [PARTNER]! Take this over for a bit.

ENEMY_NIHILISM.NAME: Nihilism
ENEMY_NIHILISM.DESC: Apply [P] Poise to ALL friendly arguments.
